com.group4.ist412.icare412

Class HTTPServer.VirtualHost

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.group4.ist412.icare412.HTTPServer.VirtualHost
  • Enclosing class:
    HTTPServer

    public static class HTTPServer.VirtualHost
extends Object
    The VirtualHost class represents a virtual host in the server.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HTTPServer.VirtualHost.ContextInfo
      The ContextInfo class holds a single context's information.

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Returns this host's name.

      • addAlias

        public void addAlias(String alias)
        Adds an alias for this host.
        Parameters:
        alias - the alias

      • getAliases

        public Set<String> getAliases()
        Returns this host's aliases.
        Returns:
        the (unmodifiable) set of aliases (which may be empty)

      • setDirectoryIndex

        public void setDirectoryIndex(String directoryIndex)
        Sets the directory index file. For every request whose URI ends with a '/' (i.e. a directory), the index file is appended to the path, and the resulting resource is served if it exists. If it does not exist, an auto-generated index for the requested directory may be served, depending on whether a generated index is allowed, otherwise an error is returned. The default directory index file is "index.html".
        Parameters:
        directoryIndex - the directory index file, or null if no index file should be used

      • getDirectoryIndex

        public String getDirectoryIndex()
        Gets this host's directory index file.
        Returns:
        the directory index file, or null

      • setAllowGeneratedIndex

        public void setAllowGeneratedIndex(boolean allowed)
        Sets whether auto-generated indices are allowed. If false, and a directory resource is requested, an error will be returned instead.
        Parameters:
        allowed - specifies whether generated indices are allowed

      • isAllowGeneratedIndex

        public boolean isAllowGeneratedIndex()
        Returns whether auto-generated indices are allowed.
        Returns:
        whether auto-generated indices are allowed

      • getMethods

        public Set<String> getMethods()
        Returns all HTTP methods explicitly supported by at least one context (this may or may not include the methods with required or built-in support).
        Returns:
        all HTTP methods explicitly supported by at least one context

      • getContext

        public HTTPServer.VirtualHost.ContextInfo getContext(String path)
        Returns the context handler for the given path. If a context is not found for the given path, the search is repeated for its parent path, and so on until a base context is found. If neither the given path nor any of its parents has a context, an empty context is returned.
        Parameters:
        path - the context's path
        Returns:
        the context info for the given path, or an empty context if none exists

      • addContext

        public void addContext(String path,
                       HTTPServer.ContextHandler handler,
                       String... methods)
        Adds a context and its corresponding context handler to this server. Paths are normalized by removing trailing slashes (except the root).
        Parameters:
        path - the context's path (must start with '/')
        handler - the context handler for the given path
        methods - the HTTP methods supported by the context handler (default is "GET")
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if path is malformed

      • addContexts

        public void addContexts(Object o)
                 throws IllegalArgumentException
        Adds contexts for all methods of the given object that are annotated with the HTTPServer.Context annotation.
        Parameters:
        o - the object whose annotated methods are added
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if a Context-annotated method has an invalid signature
